CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 20, 1969, page 9 reads: "Say it loud-Hand clapping demonstrators are shown as they circle the downtown Post Office building during the height of the Black Monday demonstration. Note the the black youngster who made the entire three mile walk on crutches."
TitMainTitle: Black Construction Coalition Black Monday demonstration with large crowd of protesters, including man on crutches, marching through Downtown Pittsburgh
